name: KanjiPractice
description:
KanjiPractice

As a Japanese student I thought that building this little app, both to test my current skills and learn Japanese was a great idea.

You can practice the order stroke of the kanjis, also learn the pictograms main meaning and their 'On' and 'Kun' readings. There are 3 common words that contain that Kanji too.

How to use this app

Draw the strokes  with the mouse in the correct order to complete the kanji.  You can hint the next stroke or see the entire kanji to follow along. Just click in the icons below to activate the options or even to reset the kanji.

Disclaimer: 

It is a mobile app so It may do not render properly in the browser.
